item.title: Altar not recharging Prayer points
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You should work on removing the nested if statements. They’re “bad” for your code.
Read what I mean here:
http://www.beenishkhan.net/2012/05/27/if-statements-are-bad-for-code-avoid-them/

You also have duplicated code:

if (c.inWild()) { c.startAnimation(645); c.playerLevel[5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]); c.sendMessage("You recharge your prayer points!"); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); return; }
This appears twice in your code.

What I would first do is change this:
if(c.playerLevel[5] < c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5])) {

So it checks if the player’s prayer level is greater than or equal to the level based on their XP.
(Note, I didn’t change it, you have to)

Then you would put something similar to this under it:

c.sendMessage("You have full points"); return; }
(ignore tabbing)

After that, you can literally remove All of this:

} else { if (c.inWild()) { c.startAnimation(645); c.playerLevel[5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]); c.sendMessage("You recharge your prayer points!"); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); return; } }

You can also remove all of this:

if (c.inWild()) { c.startAnimation(645); c.playerLevel[5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]); c.sendMessage("You recharge your prayer points!"); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); return; }
Because the code directly under it does the same thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Altar not recharging Prayer points
item.dc:creator: @seankroes seankroes
item.description:
@seankroes wrote:

GfServerMaker1:

if you get an error, it would be nice, your current code would also help… <

No errors… here is my code in Actionhander.java case 415: if(c.playerLevel[5] < c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5])) { if (c.inWild()) { c.startAnimation(645); c.playerLevel[5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]); c.sendMessage("You recharge your prayer points!"); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); return; } c.startAnimation(645); c.playerLevel[5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]); c.sendMessage("You recharge your prayer points."); //c.specAmount = 10.0; c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); } else { if (c.inWild()) { c.startAnimation(645); c.playerLevel[5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]); c.sendMessage("You recharge your prayer points!"); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); return; } } break;

Read full topic
